description: After regaining her original power, Strength attacks Black Rock Shooter ferociously. However, the Yu inside of Strength has a death wish. Black Rock Shooter sees Strength waver from the voice inside and is about to use it as an opportunity to hit Strength with a deadly blow. But in that instant, Mato, trapped within Black Rock Shooter, releases a brilliant light. When Mato next opens her eyes, she finds herself separated from Black Rock Shooter... But then the final battle between Mato and Black Rock Shooter begins!
